LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Revolutionize your car building process with our cutting-edge app!
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Design, Build, and Customize Your Dream Car
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: From concept to creation, our app empowers you to bring your automotive vision to life with ease and precision.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Design, Customize, and Create Your Perfect Vehicle
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Design your dream car with our extensive range of options and features.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Fine-tune every aspect of your vehicle for optimal power and efficiency.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Watch your vision come to life with our step-by-step virtual build process.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Create your dream car from scratch with our intuitive 3D design tools. Visualize every detail before it's built.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access a vast database of car components from top manufacturers. Find the perfect parts for your project with ease.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Step-by-step instructions and video tutorials guide you through the entire car-building process, from chassis to finish.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Test your car's theoretical performance before assembly. Optimize for speed, efficiency, or handling with real-time adjustments.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Share your finished builds, get inspired by others, and connect with fellow car enthusiasts in our thriving community.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Get personalized advice from experienced mechanics and automotive engineers whenever you need it, right in the app.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Rev Up Your Car Building Journey
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in touch with our automotive experts to start creating your dream car
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our car building app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is the car building app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our car building app is a comprehensive tool that guides users through the process of designing and customizing their dream car, from choosing the chassis to selecting interior finishes.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Do I need any prior car-building experience to use this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: No, our app is designed for both beginners and experienced car enthusiasts. It provides step-by-step guidance and explanations throughout the building process.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I save my car designs and come back to them later?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, you can save multiple car designs in your account and return to edit or finalize them at any time. This allows you to experiment with different configurations at your own pace.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Does the app provide cost estimates for the car builds?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely! As you select different components and features, the app provides real-time cost estimates, helping you stay within your budget while building your dream car.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I order parts or get manufacturer connections through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: While our app doesn't directly sell parts, it does provide links to reputable suppliers and manufacturers for each component in your car design, making it easier to source the materials you need.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the car building app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app guides you through the process of designing and building your own car, from selecting components to assembly instructions. It provides a user-friendly interface with 3D models, step-by-step tutorials, and expert advice.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Do I need prior experience to use this app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: No prior experience is necessary. Our app caters to both beginners and experienced car enthusiasts. We offer different difficulty levels and provide comprehensive guidance throughout the entire building process.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I customize my car design?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Our app offers a wide range of customization options, including body styles, colors, engines, interiors, and performance upgrades. You can create a unique car that perfectly matches your preferences and vision.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What kind of support is available if I encounter issues?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We provide extensive support through in-app chat, video tutorials, a community forum, and direct access to automotive experts. Whether you have questions about design, component compatibility, or assembly techniques, help is always at your fingertips.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 AutoCraft. Empowering automotive enthusiasts to build their dream cars.
CTA_BODY: Transform your automotive vision into reality with our innovative car-building platform.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: From Design to Drive: Your Car, Your Way
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from automotive enthusiasts who have revolutionized their car-building experience with our app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has completely transformed how I approach car building. It's like having a master mechanic in my pocket!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: From selecting parts to step-by-step assembly guides, this app makes custom car building accessible to everyone.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The 3D modeling feature helped me visualize my project before I even picked up a wrench. Absolutely game-changing!
HERO_SUBTITLE: From concept to creation, we're your ultimate car-building companion
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Rev Up Your Inbox: Get the Latest Car Building Updates!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Design, customize, and build your perfect vehicle with our innovative car-building app
